sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Solid Waste Hauling and Recycling Program Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Solid Waste Hauling and Recycling Program Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act, unless the context clearly indicates otherwise:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act, unless the context clearly indicates otherwise:

sections.heading: Compliance. Nothing in  this Act shall exempt a hauler from obtaining a license or permit required by other applicable laws or regulations
sections.text: The hauler shall at all times operate in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.

sections.heading: Applicability. Nothing in this Act shall apply to a contract or franchise awarded pursuant to Section 11-19-1 of the Municipal Code, entered into before the effective date of this Act
sections.text: Nothing in this Act shall apply to a municipality with a population of 2,000,000 or more.

sections.heading: Home rule. No home rule municipality with a population of less than 2,000,000 or home rule county may  provide for the collection of recyclable materials in a manner less restrictive than the provisions of  this Act
sections.text: This Act is a limitation under subsection (i) of Section 6 of Article VII of the Il

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
